item.title: Let's crack Bandit Part 1
item.description: Let’s give Bandit from the overthewire war games a going over. I did this a while back, but never really wrote it up, so I’m going to do it again and write it up. Remember that you can copy and paste from all the asciinema videos below. Bandit is a CTF/wargame for beginners and a great intro to various linux tools as well. I won’t repeat the level summary for each post, instead there’s a link to the original page for each section.

item.title: Let's crack Bandit Part 2
item.description: Continues on from Let’s crack Bandit Part 1 Level 15 -> 16 Level 15 Eventhough this is very similar to the previous level, it’s a little more complicated as we need to connect with SSL. The simplest way is using openssl with s_client. Once connected it’s the same dance as above bandit15@melinda:~$ openssl s_client -quiet -connect localhost:30001 depth=0 CN = li190-250.members.linode.com verify error:num=18:self signed certificate verify return:1 depth=0 CN = li190-250.members.linode.com verify return:1 BfMYroe26WYalil77FoDi9qh59eK5xNr Correct!
